name: Freeport Village Premier Inn
description:
The Freeport Village Premier Inn is located in the Freeport Village shopping outlet, which is a 15-20min drive from the reception venue.
The hotel has free parking, a restaurant and bar on site, serves breakfast, and is 2 miles from Braintree train station.

name: Travel Lodge Braintree
description:
The Travel Lodge Braintree is located in the heart of Braintree, a 6mins drive to the church and 20mins drive to the reception venue.
The hotel has on-site paid parking but is also a 5 minute walk (300metres) from the local train station. Guests can also opt for a cooked breakfast.

name: The White Hart Hotel
description:
The White Hart Hotel is a 16th century inn located in Braintree town centre, 15 minute walk from the station.
The hotel is a short journey from both the church and reception and is connected to a Greene king pub and restaurant which serves breakfast.
The hotel has free parking and is a great place to stay if you are looking for a traditional English hotel with lots of character. There is no lift so you will have to climb stairs to your room.
